summary: Worked for the CloudTech division of the company with the responsibility and ownership of developing the Service Platform Layer for Adobe ContentPlatform.

myPNRstatus.com is a free online SMS alert service to minimize the worries ofIndian Railway Travellers by eliminating the need for them to go online againand again in order to get the information about their PNR status or Delay inTrain Timings.
Worked with Bing - Segment Division and was involved with various release such as Windows Blue (Windows 8.1) and Cortana

Worked on the EITM Software Service Desk. Service Desk is a product intended to provide a Single Point of Contact("SPOC") to meet the communications needs of both Users and IT and tosatisfy both Customer and IT Provider objectives.
